title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       St. Louis weather can be uncomfortable and occasionally severe, so please plan your visit accordingly. High heat and humidity, severe thunderstorms, snow and ice, and extreme cold are all possible depending upon the season. For an update of inclement weather conditions which may affect your visit, call (314)842-1867 and follow the instructions to connect to the inclement weather report.
